price: Wͻkaa sε: “Kronkron Hene ne yɛ Wura Nyankopͻn. Nokorε sε, yɛayε bͻne”.
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
